summary:
**Doctor Strange (2016)**

"Doctor Strange" is a 2016 superhero movie about a brain surgeon, Stephen Strange, who becomes a master of mystic arts after a car crash ends his career. Benedict Cumberbatch stars as Strange, learning magic to protect the world. The film, part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe, was a long time in the making, with early development starting in the 1980s. It was finally released in 2016, making over $677 million and getting praised for its effects and music. A sequel, "Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness," came out in 2022.
title: Doctor Strange (2016 film)
